duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee, review, and administer student records by analyzing data, counseling students, and providing recommendations.
Provide advice to students on a range of issues, including academic progress, career plans, and community standards.
Collect and analyze data from multiple sources including student feedback, surveys, trend reports, and data analytics.
Develop, analyze, review policies, processes, and programs by incorporating feedback and trend data learned from interactions with students.
Assist in planning and developing program activities and outreach functions.
Provide oversight with the administration of financial processes such as financial reimbursements, data entry, reviewing contracts, and resolving issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and two years of relevant experience, or combination of education and relevant experience.
